Index >  CapValueType

CapValueType

Description

Returns or sets the value type for reading the value of a capability.

Data type

EnumDWT_CapValueType (short)

Syntax

.CapValueType = EnumDWT_CapValueType.TWTY_INT16;

Remarks

When you try to read a capability value, check CapValueType after you call CapGet().
When you try to write a capability value, set CapValueType before you call CapSet().

Allowed ValueNumeric value
TWTY_INT80
TWTY_INT161
TWTY_INT322
TWTY_UINT83
TWTY_UINT164
TWTY_int5
TWTY_BOOL6
TWTY_FIX327
TWTY_FRAME8
TWTY_STR329
TWTY_STR6410
TWTY_STR12811
TWTY_STR25512
